name: complexity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 [ U ] the state of having many parts and being difficult to understand or find an answer to: a problem of great complexity complexities [ plural ]
the features of something that make it difficult to understand or find an answer to: There are a lot of complexities surrounding this issue.
